description.displayText: Over the years as a close relative of Nike, there have been notable qualities that shone with her. For example, she's very hardworking when it comes to a task and never fails to go past the limit. Not only that, but she's also very patient, caring, and trustworthy. You wouldn't regret hiring somebody like her since these qualities make up the best of her personality. She is always right on point with her tasks and is a punctual person when it comes to her priorities.
description.originalText: Over the years as a close relative of Nike, there have been notable qualities that shone with her. For example, she's very hardworking when it comes to a task and never fails to go past the limit. Not only that, but she's also very patient, caring, and trustworthy. You wouldn't regret hiring somebody like her since these qualities make up the best of her personality. She is always right on point with her tasks and is a punctual person when it comes to her priorities.

description.displayText: It gives me a great pleasure to recommend Nike A. for a job. She's passionate about caring for people, competent, well organized, positive attitude, hard working, God-fearing, and trustworthy. You can contact me for any further question. I've known her for more than 10 years, and she did excellently to care for my mother.
